channel.title: Mailchimp, basic copy-editing, layout stuff
channel.description:
Anyone out there that knows mailchimp, does basic copy-editing and layout type stuff? I had a customer of mine ask me.
The reason I'm posting here is because that strikes me as an excellent opportunity for productized consulting (like *really* excellent I'm working hard to avoid shiny object syndrome right about now).
Thanks!

item.title: Mailchimp, basic copy-editing, layout stuff
item.dc:creator: kalenjordan
item.description:
Do you guys have packages? Is your pricing available online? Do you guys do split testing?

Read full topic

item.title: Mailchimp, basic copy-editing, layout stuff

item.title: Mailchimp, basic copy-editing, layout stuff
item.dc:creator: gavin
item.description:
Hi @kalenjordan - sorry to resurect an old post but your question is pretty much what we do at Greenlight - email marketing (design, writing, formatting, sending and reporting) for a monthly fee. MailChimp is our platform of choice, but we’ve got experience with Constant Contact, Infusionsoft and HubSpot as well.

Read full topic
